mapper.select: SELECT count(case_id) total FROM sys_case WHERE project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT count(defect_id) total, sum(case when defect_state=0 or defect_state=3 then 1 else 0 end) as pending_count, sum(case when defect_state=1 then 1 else 0 end) as verify_count, sum(case when defect_state=2 or defect_state=4 then 1 else 0 end) as closed_count FROM sys_defect WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT count(module_id) total FROM sys_module WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT count(report_id) total FROM sys_report WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT count(doc_id) total FROM sys_document WHERE doc_type = 1 AND project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT count(up.user_id) total, sum(case when upr.role_id = 6 then 1 else 0 end) as admin_count, sum(case when upr.role_id = 7 then 1 else 0 end) as development_count, sum(case when upr.role_id = 8 then 1 else 0 end) as test_count, sum( CASE WHEN upr.role_id = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS outside_count FROM sys_user_project up LEFT JOIN sys_user_project_role upr ON up.user_project_id=upr.user_project_id WHERE up.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT count(*) as defect_count,
date_format( update_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS defect_time,
date_format( update_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS defect_time,
defect_state FROM sys_defect WHERE project_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY defect_time, defect_state ORDER BY defect_time, defect_state

SELECT count(*) as defect_count,
PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(update_time, '%Y-%m'), '%Y-%m') AS defect_time,
PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS defect_time,
defect_state FROM sys_defect WHERE project_id = #{projectId} GROUP BY defect_time, defect_state ORDER BY defect_time, defect_state

SELECT date_format( update_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS handle_time, SUM( CASE WHEN plan_item_state = 'pass' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS pass_count FROM sys_plan_item pi WHERE plan_id = #{ planId } GROUP BY plan_id, handle_time ORDER BY handle_time

SELECT plan_id, PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS handle_time, SUM( CASE WHEN plan_item_state = 'pass' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS pass_count FROM sys_plan_item pi WHERE plan_id = #{ planId } GROUP BY plan_id, handle_time ORDER BY handle_time

SELECT u.user_id, u.nick_name, u.user_name, u.avatar, d.defect_total, d.defect_today_count FROM ( SELECT update_by_id, SUM( defect_total ) AS defect_total, SUM( defect_today_count ) AS defect_today_count FROM (( SELECT l.create_by AS update_by_id, count( DISTINCT l.defect_id ) AS defect_total, count( DISTINCT CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT( l.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d' ) THEN l.defect_id ELSE NULL END ) AS defect_today_count FROM sys_defect_log l JOIN sys_defect e ON e.defect_id = l.defect_id WHERE e.project_id=#{projectId} GROUP BY e.project_id, l.create_by ORDER BY defect_total DESC ) UNION SELECT create_by AS update_by_id, 0 AS defect_total, 0 AS defect_today_count FROM sys_project WHERE project_id=#{projectId} ) a GROUP BY update_by_id ) d LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON d.update_by_id = u.user_id

SELECT u.user_id, u.nick_name, u.user_name, u.avatar, d.defect_total, d.defect_today_count FROM ( SELECT l.create_by AS update_by_id, count( DISTINCT l.defect_id ) AS defect_total, count( DISTINCT CASE WHEN PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(l.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') = PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN l.defect_id ELSE NULL END ) AS defect_today_count FROM sys_defect_log l JOIN sys_defect e ON e.defect_id = l.defect_id WHERE e.project_id=#{projectId} GROUP BY e.project_id, l.create_by ORDER BY defect_total DESC ) d LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON d.update_by_id = u.user_id

SELECT u.nick_name, u.user_name, u.avatar, d.create_time, d.defect_today_count FROM ( SELECT e.project_id,
DATE_FORMAT( l.create_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS create_time,
DATE_FORMAT( l.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS create_time,
l.create_by AS update_by_id, count( DISTINCT l.defect_id ) AS defect_today_count FROM sys_defect_log l JOIN sys_defect e ON e.defect_id = l.defect_id WHERE e.project_id=#{projectId} GROUP BY e.project_id, create_time, l.create_by ORDER BY create_time DESC ) d LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON d.update_by_id = u.user_id

SELECT u.nick_name, u.user_name, u.avatar, d.create_time, d.defect_today_count FROM ( SELECT e.project_id,
PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(l.create_time, '%Y-%m'), '%Y-%m') AS create_time,
PARSEDATETIME(FORMATDATETIME(l.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m') AS create_time,
l.create_by AS update_by_id, count( DISTINCT l.defect_id ) AS defect_today_count FROM sys_defect_log l JOIN sys_defect e ON e.defect_id = l.defect_id WHERE e.project_id=#{projectId} GROUP BY e.project_id, create_time, l.create_by ORDER BY create_time DESC ) d LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON d.update_by_id = u.user_id
